Is there a disposition on the whole to denounce
instrumental or symphonic music as against vocalic

Yes, absolutely. There is no definite denunciation but
there is criticism of Soviet composers, particularly of
composers like Prokofiev and Miaskovsky, to some extent
Shostakovich, that they fail to write folk music, which
is supposed to be the natural form of self-expression
in music.
